enum.name: TransactionState
enum.description: Represents the current state of transaction.

value.name: started
value.description: This value shall be returned if the transaction was started and no updateTransaction or finishTransaction was called on the transaction and the transaction is not considered abandoned by the device.

value.name: updated
value.description: This value shall be returned if the transaction was updated and no unprotected update data is handeled by the device (= all updates have been protected by log messages) and the transaction is not considered abandoned by the device.

value.name: updatedWithUnprotectedData
value.description: This value shall be returned if the transaction was started and updated and there is still unprotected data handeled by the device that is not protected by log messages, yet.

value.name: finished
value.description: This value shall be returned if the transaction was finished.

value.name: abandoned
value.description: This value shall be returned if the transaction is considered abandoned by the device.
